s: July 12, 2023 - Generally (unless some behavioral issue was raised) Amazon does not put more than 1 year cooling period but given the macro economic conditions and a virtual hiring freeze for 2023, 2 years might have been set as cooling period as 1 year would have been contributed by hiring freeze.

s: February 7, 2021 - In recruitment policy terms, “cool off period” represents the duration that a candidate is barred from re-applying at a company where she / he was rejected. Most companies have the cool off period defined as 6 months.
